document.full_text: ms. lomax borrowed $100 to found the los angeles tribune, which served the city's black population in the 1940s and '50s and had a reputation for fearless reporting.
document.title: almena lomax, who founded los angeles tribune, is dead at 95
lines_and_colors: ms. lomax borrowed $100 to found the los angeles tribune, which served the city's black population in the 1940s and '50s and had a reputation for fearless reporting.
